Name: Kine
About the game: Kine is a charming 3D puzzle game about three musical machines hoping to find their big break. Guide these dreamers through a delightful tale of love, labor, and loss as they struggle to form a band and find success on the main stage. Manipulate and maneuver each character by taking advantage of their unique abilities. Navigate a stunningly beautiful world filled with a wide variety of 3D puzzles while listening to an award-winning original soundtrack. Award-winning soundtrack! Over 120 unique puzzles! Quirky yellow robots!
